alert.note: Alert for Allen; Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Logan, Simpson and southwestern Allen Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Portland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Logan, Simpson and southwestern Allen Counties, including the following locations... Black Jack, Neosheo, Clare, Geddes, Mcelroy Ford, Alonzo, Pope, Butlersville, Trammel and New Roe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kentucky.
